name: Garik Loran: Master Pilot Quiz | Star Wars Books | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Face.

	Garik's nickname is "Face" because of his former career as a child actor. He became known across the galaxy, and later went into hiding after he was believed killed in a firefight.

questions.text: When he first appeared, Garik sported a scar on his face.
questions.explanation:
True.

	The scar was gained when Garik narrowly avoided a laser blast. The scar went from his left cheek to the right part of his forehead. He later had it fixed, but still wears a fake scar in order to mask his appearance.

Pantolomin.

	Pantolomin is a resort planet known for its casinos. An oceanic world, the casinos were located in submarines.

questions.text: When he joined Wraith Squadron, what was Garik's callsign?
questions.explanation:
Wraith Eight.

	'Wraith Three' was originally Falynn Sandskimmer, 'Wraith Seven' was originally Ton Phanan, Garik's wingman and good friend, and Myn Donos was originally 'Wraith Nine'.

questions.text: With which Twi'lek pilot did Garik have a romantic involvement?
questions.explanation:
Dia Passik.

	Nawara Ven is a Twi'lek lawyer, Rhysati is his wife, and Talon Karrde is a human smuggler. Dia Passik was Garik's fellow pilot from Wraith Squadron.

questions.text: Immediately after joining the New Republic, which squadron did Garik fly in?
questions.explanation:
Comet Squadron.

	Comet Squadron was led by Colonel Edor Crespin at the time. Garik often clashed with his commanding officers and was cited for insubordination, making Wraith Squadron his last chance at flying.

questions.text: When Wraith Squadron went undercover as the Hawk-Bats, what was Garik's alias?
questions.explanation:
General Kargin.

	As the fake Kargin, Garik wore many fake scars in order to hide his very famous appearance. Under this guise, Garik led Wraith Squadron in their infiltration of Warlord Zsinj's forces.

questions.text: Who was Garik's rival during his acting days?
questions.explanation:
Tetran Cowell.

	Tetran Cowell was one of Garik's fellow holodrama actors, but Garik claimed that Cowell had little in the way of acting talent. It was this enmity that led to Garik finally having his facial scar removed.

questions.text: Garik was promoted to Full Captain at the end of which book?
questions.explanation:
"Solo Command".

	While Garik was previously made a brevet captain, he gained the full rank at the end of "Solo Command".

questions.text: According to Garik, what would he do if he was Force-sensitive?
options: Use it to change the channel
Use it to pull things closer to him
questions.explanation:
Use it to scratch himself.

	In "X-Wing:Wraith Squadron" by Aaron Allston, Garik says: "You know, if I had even the tiniest control over the Force, what I'd do with it? On those long missions, I'd scratch that little spot in the center of my back I can never reach."
